#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
#define MOD 8388608
ll pwr(ll a, ll b) {
    if(b==0)
        return 1;
    ll ans=1;
    while(b) {
        if(b&1)
            ans=((ans%MOD)*(a%MOD))%MOD;
        b/=2;
        a=((a%MOD)*(a%MOD))%MOD;
    }
    return ans%MOD;
}

long long dp[1000];
int main()
{
    for(long long i=1;i<200;i++)
    {
        long long n=(i*(i+1))/2;
        ll p = pwr(2,i-1);
        ll ans = ((p%MOD)*(n%MOD))%MOD;
        dp[i]=(dp[i-1]+ans)%MOD;
    }
    int t;cin>>t;
    while(t--) {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n<100)
                cout<<dp[n]<<endl;
        else
                cout<<MOD-1<<endl;
   }
}
